name: PicoPlex
description:
Picoplex is a remake of one of my favourite games when I was a kid, in pico8. It's still a work in progress, but I hope to add the snik snaks soon. Quarantine is very productive.

Music in pico8 done by lisergishnu, and much help from rumpelcita for level painting. Love ya, guys.

Also much love to the pico8, it's like going back to all those nights spent programming in pascal when I was a teenager.
